* BrightBlade looked down at Gangon as he had begun to look at and polish 
his gun, then a bit concerned about what had happened last time when he had 
actuallt tried to hotwire a weapon.*

" Uh...You had better but that away for now. Liono might get the wrong idea 
and think that you mean to kill him, not something we want him to assume 
when we're trying to form an allience with him and his Maximals."

* She then looked back to Hell Beast and stood by for any orders in which he 
might give, making her look like a solfire standing at attention.*
